content.raw:
Backed out. That makes sense - just because we emitted the signal doesn't mean it's an event the recipient of the signal has handled. So it blocks keypresses from propagating.

I checked how to use QShortcut - I will just change the keyboard shortcuts to use this, I don't see any downside to it and it seems like the kosher way to do it instead of manually getting the events and potentially breaking the whole app...
content.html:
Backed out. That makes sense - just because we emitted the signal doesn't mean it's an event the recipient of the signal has handled. So it blocks keypresses from propagating.

I checked how to use QShortcut - I will just change the keyboard shortcuts to use this, I don't see any downside to it and it seems like the kosher way to do it instead of manually getting the events and potentially breaking the whole app...
